T

takeBurn() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Applies a Burn (Selen) effect to this enemy for 4 seconds, reducing its health over time.
Called when a projectile whose source is Selen collides with this enemy.
takeDamage(int) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Reduces the health of this enemy by the passed amount.
takeFrozen() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Applies a Frozen (Petra) effect to this enemy for 0.75 seconds, reducing its movement speed by 100%.
takeHaste() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Unit
Checks if the unit was not recently hasted by Rosemi.
takePurge() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Instantly remove this enemy from the playing field.
takeSlow() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Applies a Slow (Elira) effect to this enemy for 2.5 seconds, reducing its movement speed by 60%.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.EnemyManager
Updates the movement and animation of all enemies.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.ProjectileManager.Explosion
Updates the animation and lifetime of the explosion.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.ProjectileManager
Updates the position and animation of all projectiles and detects if a projectile collides with an enemy.
Creates an explosion in the collision if the projectile was fired by Elira.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.UnitManager
Updates all units on the field and checks if the unit is ready to attack an enemy or buff an ally (Rosemi).
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.WaveManager
Updates game timers used for controlling the delay of spawning between enemies and the delay for spawning enemies between waves.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Unit
Runs a set of tick methods.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Editing
Updates the animation of all tiles in the editing field.
tick() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Facilitates the spawning and pathfinding of new waves and enemies (WaveManager, EnemyManager); the creation, deletion, and targeting of all units (UnitManager); and the creation, deletion, and velocity of projectiles (ProjectileManager).
tickAnimation() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.GameScene
Ticks the current frame every 0.16 seconds which animates all level tiles on the playing field.
Tile - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.objects
A tile is a superclass that represents the grid system of the game and interacts with game logic such as if a unit is able to be placed or if an enemy can pathfind to the set location.
A tile in a location can be edited using the game's built-in level editor or by using pre-defined level files.
Tile(BufferedImage[], int, int) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Tile
Creates an animated tile that can be placed and interacted with using game logic.
Tile(BufferedImage, int, int) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Tile
Creates a non-animated tile that can be placed and interacted with using game logic.
TileManager - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.managers
Facilitates the rendering of tiles.
TileManager() - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
Initializes all Tile objects used in the game.
tiles - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
Stores an array list of Tile objects used for rendering a level.
Tiles() - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Tiles
 
tilesGrassCorners - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
A sub-array list containing grass corners composed of TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_TL, TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_TR, TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_BL, and TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_BR.
tilesGrassEdges - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
A sub-array list containing grass edges composed of TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_T, TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_B, TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_L, and TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_R.
tilesGrassVariants - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
A sub-array list containing TileManager.GRASS_BASE variants composed of TileManager.GRASS_VAR_A, TileManager.GRASS_EDGE_B, and TileManager.GRASS_VAR_C.
tilesWaterCorners - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
A sub-array list containing water corners composed of TileManager.WATER_EDGE_TL, TileManager.WATER_EDGE_TR, TileManager.WATER_EDGE_BL, and TileManager.WATER_EDGE_BR.
tilesWaterEdges - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.TileManager
A sub-array list containing water edges composed of TileManager.WATER_EDGE_T, TileManager.WATER_EDGE_B, TileManager.WATER_EDGE_L, and TileManager.WATER_EDGE_R.
ToolBar - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.ui
A toolbar is a subclass of a bar used for selecting and placing down tiles in the game's built-in level editor.
ToolBar(int, int, int, int, Editing) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.ToolBar
Creates a new bar in defined location, and initializes all tile buttons and tile sprites.
